Class SvgSpline

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.svg.SvgElement

              dxf2svg.svg.SvgSpline
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SvgSpline
extends SvgGraphicElement

This class encapsulates curves whose Dxf equivilant is the spline object.

Version:
0.02 - December 10, 2002
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

addControlPoint

public void addControlPoint(double x,
                            double y)

normalizeControlPoints

protected void normalizeControlPoints()
This removes the redundant first and last control points as they are the same as the first and last fit points in a planar and linear spline.

setSplineFlag

public void setSplineFlag(int flag)
Sets the flag that indicates what type of spline we are dealing with. Spline flag are bit encoded with the following meanings:
1 = Closed spline.
2 = Periodic spline.
4 = Rational spline.
8 = Planar. Generic spline.
16 = Linear (planar bit is also set).

Parameters:
flag - integer value of the bit settings.

calculateMyUniqueData

protected java.lang.String calculateMyUniqueData()
This class encapsultates a spline curve. This class is incomplete, it needs more research into the conversion between a mathematical b-spline and a quadradic Beziér curve. For now it only draws straight lines between the spline points. It remians unfinished because of the relative rarity of splines in our files that we are converting verses the amount of time required to research and fix the algorithm.

Overrides:
calculateMyUniqueData in class SvgObject
Returns:
String In the case of SvgObject it returns an empty String.

getElementAsPath

public java.lang.String getElementAsPath()
Returns the description of the spline as a path in a String format.
